#summary How to to install the jaxb-addon with Roo 1.1.0.M3 shell
#labels Phase-Deploy

===How to install jaxb-addon Spring Roo Addon===

_*Note*: Roo 1.1.0.M3 is incompatible [http://www.springsource.com/products/springsource-google-download STS 2.3.3.M2]. Until STS 2.3.3.M3 is released you should use the stand-alone Roo shell instead_

=== Installation instructions ===
 * Uninstall the older addon versions
{{{
  roo> osgi uninstall --bundleSymbolicName net.tzolov.jaxb.roo.addon
}}}
 * Install the addon directly from the googlecode site
{{{ 
  roo> felix shell start http://spring-roo-addons.googlecode.com/files/net.tzolov.jaxb.roo.addon-1.1.2-SNAPSHOT.jar 
}}}
  Alternatively you can download the [http://spring-roo-addons.googlecode.com/files/net.tzolov.jaxb.roo.addon-1.1.2-SNAPSHOT.jar jaxb.roo.addon] and install it from your local folder:
{{{
  roo> felix shell start file:/<absolute path>/net.tzolov.jaxb.roo.addon-1.1.2-SNAPSHOT.jar
}}}
 * Verify the installation:
{{{
  roo> osgi ps 
}}}
 * You should see something like:
{{{
...
[  60] [Active     ] [    1] net.tzolov.jaxb.roo.addon (1.1.2.SNAPSHOT)
}}}
 * From the Roo Shell type *help* to see the list of all supported commands. The following line should appear amongst others entries:
{{{
...
jaxb xsd compiler setup - Install JAXB2 maven plugin to generate Java classes from an XML schema with the xjc schema compiler tool.
}}}
